name: Fatal Fury Special [GG]
description: Fatal Fury Special (餓狼伝説SPECIAL, Garou Densetsu Special, "Legend of the Hungry Wolf Special") is a 1993 fighting game developed and published by SNK and originally released for the Neo Geo arcade and home platforms. It is an updated version of 1992's Fatal Fury 2, introducing several changes to the gameplay system while expanding the available character roster.
